lines.text: Don't worry, Son! We Marines have no qualms about killing Martians!

[Mocking David]
Poor little guy... Poor little guy...
You're not just a crazy child, are you?
These things! They're huge, ugly, slimy, giant Mr. Potato Heads!
General Wilson! We have one of their weapons here. I know it sounds crazy...
That just might work if we can figure out how to make it work in time!
General Wilson? Fuel! It needs fuel. Copper! Copper is what they use. I saw them onload this.
Well, maybe a penny will do it!
Dammit! I had a whole bagful!
Great Scott! Hasn't anybody got a penny?
We don't carry loose change into combat, sir.
